name: ExplainJuicebox
description:
We're crypto veterans who think juicebox is the next big thing. We want to utilize the platform to fund perpetual crypto education. First we'll explain juicebox. Then the community votes what we explain next. 

Over $500 Million raised: https://peerthroughmedia.com/video-portfolio/
payDisclosure: Yo yo, while we do have incredible video marketing skills. For now, this is just an experiment on perpetually funding crypto education. As a contributor, you can expect no monetary gain, just governance over what we explain next - oh, and likely an NFT + bragging rights.
